summary: The BuildRequest requires replacing the static logo in the hero section with an animated video. The diff shows the video was successfully added to AuthGate.tsx (the login card), but there is no evidence of changes to the actual hero section in UploadPage.tsx where the main hero content resides.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the static LookyLoo-logo.png in the hero section with LookyLoo-gif.mp4
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows changes to AuthGate.tsx (login card) but not to UploadPage.tsx which contains the actual hero section. The file summary mentions 'a hero section reduced by 25%' in UploadPage.tsx but shows no logo/video replacement in that file's diff content.

hallucinated_features.description: Video logo added to AuthGate.tsx login card with scale-150 transformation
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states the logo should be replaced in the hero section and lists 'Changing any other hero section elements besides the logo replacement' as a non-goal. The AuthGate.tsx login card is not the hero section. Adding the video here was not requested.
